name: Kaskus Velomus
description:
Re-Style 
* Default color
* Login Form
* Notification
* Navigation Button Search
* Navigation Left
* Home Profile
* Button Page
* Paging Button
* Single Post
* etc
Feature 
* Thread FJB like Thread Forum
* Show Moderator Forum, Top Threads, and Top Features
* Hide VM Deleted
* Link source has been remove
additional_info:
v1.9.5 Kaskus Velomus 09/03/2016
v1.9.1 Kaskus Velomus 20/03/2015
v1.9.0 Kaskus Velomus 17/03/2015
v1.8.1 Kaskus Velomus 08/03/2015
v1.8.0 Kaskus Velomus 07/03/2015
v1.7.0 (Kaskus Velomus aka Kaskus Evonical v6.3) #Final With Stylish
v1.6.0 (Kaskus Evonical Ver 6 Final aka Kaskus Style by .ceo.) #With Greasymonkey
v1.5.0 (Kaskus Style by .ceo. rev5) #Manual CSS
v1.0.0 (Kaskus Style by .ceo.) #Manual CSS
Fix Bugs 1.9.5 | update 09/03/2016 
* Fix #main
* Fix Top Thread (Sub Forum)
* Fix Top Features (Sub Forum)
* Fix Moderator (Sub Forum)
* Fix More from Jual Beli (Sub Forum)
* Fix Breadcrumb
* Fix Sidebar Forum (Size)
* Fix Sidebar (Forum Lounge Video)
* Fix Thread Video
* Fix Thread FJB
Rekomended Tools 
* Kaskus Quick Reply v5.3.1.2 | update 22/02/2015
